sonar.long_description: An online player choice stats dashboard. Inspired from games like Detroit: Become Human and Dispatch.

chart.short_description: A visual mapper for your project
chart.long_description: A visual mapper for Ren'Py assets, characters, scenes, scripts, and more.

horizon.short_description: A visual board for your inspirations
horizon.long_description: A visual board for all your inspiration and branding needs.

crew.long_description: Collaborate with your team easier! Bring your own cloud storage, and update your progress with the team using a simplified version control.

cargo.long_description: Packages installer - Packages are ready-to-use Ren'Py code. They are either built by Allneos or the Ren'Py community.
